event.title: Pub / Social
event.description:
It's been suggested by more than one of you beer guzzlers ( and I wonder why - http://www.mid-day.com/relationships/2012/jun/250612-Beer-guzzlers-likelier-to-have-sex-on-first-date.htm ) that the next meetup should be a social.

 

So a swift return to The Tobacco Factory, which incidentally is the closest bar to both Rick and I.

 

I've put down Wed 12th @ 8pm - hope it's ok.

 

Southville JavaScript and T25 Owners club.
